comment: The main content area containing Chinese characters, including small seal script (篆书) and explanations in regular script, arranged in vertical columns. The text includes definitions, phonetic annotations (e.g., '聲子代切'), and structural analysis of characters, typical of a classical Chinese dictionary or lexicographical work such as the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The layout is traditional, with black ink on aged paper, and a thick black border framing the text block.
